text: Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu tathāsamāhitaṃ cittaṃ sādhukaṃ ajjhupekkhitā hoti upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchati
edit: Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu tathāsamāhitaṃ cittaṃ sādhukaṃ ajjhupekkhitā hoti upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchati

translations.transtext: In which occasion, monks, when the mind got concentrated as such, [and] the monk becomes indifferent properly, in that occasion equanimity-factor of enlightenment gets started. In that occasion, the monk cultivates the equanimity-factor of the enlightenment. In that occasion, the monk's equanimity-factor of the enlightenment becomes fully developed.
